greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of lattice paths without interior points from {3}^n to {0}^n using steps that decrement one component by 1.
comment: An interior point p = (p_1, ..., p_n) has n>0 components with 0<p_i<3 for 1<=i<=n.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
example: a(1) = 0, there is no path from (3) to (0) without interior points.
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Apr 27 2013
